name: Techno
description: A genre of electronic dance music characterized by a repetitive four on the floor beat.

name: Hard Techno
description: A subgenre of techno music with a faster tempo and harder, darker sounds.

name: House
description: A genre of electronic dance music characterized by a repetitive four on the floor beat and a tempo of 120-130 BPM.

name: Minimal Techno
description: A subgenre of techno music characterized by minimalistic elements and repetitive beats.

name: Industrial
description: A genre of electronic music that draws on harsh, transgressive or provocative sounds and themes.

name: Acid
description: A subgenre of house music that developed from the mid-1980s onwards, defined by its 'acid' sound, typically produced by the Roland TB-303.

name: Deep Techno
description: A subgenre of techno music characterized by deep basslines and atmospheric sounds.

name: Melodic Techno
description: A subgenre of techno music characterized by melodic elements and emotional undertones.

name: Trance
description: A genre of electronic dance music that developed during the early 1990s, characterized by a tempo of between 125 and 150 BPM, repeating melodic phrases, and a musical form that distinctly builds up and down throughout a track.

name: Drum and Bass
description: A genre of electronic music characterized by fast breakbeats (typically 160-180 BPM) with heavy bass and sub-bass lines.

name: Dubstep
description: A genre of electronic dance music characterized by sparse, syncopated rhythmic patterns with prominent sub-bass frequencies.

name: Electro
description: A genre of electronic music and early hip hop directly influenced by the use of the Roland TR-808 drum machines, and funk.

name: Hardcore
description: A genre of electronic dance music characterized by a very fast tempo (typically 160-200 BPM) and the rhythm is often distorted and overdriven.

name: Progressive House
description: A subgenre of house music that developed in the 1990s, characterized by a progressive structure and layers of synths and melodies.

name: Ambient
description: A genre of music that puts an emphasis on tone and atmosphere over traditional musical structure or rhythm.

name: Tech House
description: A subgenre of house music that combines elements of techno and house.

name: Psytrance
description: A genre of electronic dance music characterized by arrangements of synthetic rhythms and complex layered melodies created by high tempo riffs.

name: Breakbeat
description: A broad style of electronic or dance-oriented music characterized by the use of breaks.

name: Future Bass
description: A genre of electronic dance music characterized by wobbly synths, pitched vocal chops, and a lot of sidechain.

name: Synthwave
description: A genre of electronic music influenced by 1980s music and films.
